1_1NGtwPu16u2iVu35a6jwGF7ijxN6yUXaBA.body:
> [squeezit](#comment_4_1GzGCc4PYVgD3XqQV3tpT8ow6bWGySa25a): What do you mean by "activate" a CP site?I'm a bit worried about accidentally clicking a bad link on this website.  There's plenty of shit I do not want to see. But as far as I know it's still completely anonymous

ZeroNet sites are like torrents - they are hosted by the people that visit them. So when you visit a site, you're downloading the data from the people that have visited the site before.

Of course, this means that once you've visited a site, all of the site's content gets downloaded to your PC, and you also become a host.

Therefore, someone could easily get a LOT of people in trouble just by posting illicit content on to some widely used site.
